channel.description: Recent content in Geospatial on Matt Richards - Blog

item.title: Setting up a pandas/main environment for GeoPandas
item.description: Although it’s not something I tend to advertise very often, I’m a maintainer for GeoPandas which is the de-facto standard tool for tabular geospatial analysis in Python. My contributions here wax and wane here with the amount of free time and mental space I have to volunteer. As part of this, we keep the software in sync with developments in pandas, and our CI tests against pandas/main. From time to time (more frequently with the upcoming pandas 2.
